comment.body:
> [nofishes](#comment_1_12yaKkoqVKBUi66uB5pYXamWguKFaWdDnx): Make all the pictures optional Please :)ï¼Œin content.json
> ...
> "description": "Download MR. ROBOT (ZeroNet)",
>  "optional":"data/img/.*",
>  "files": {
> ...

Thank you! Now it's all right! =)

> [nofishes](#comment_2_12yaKkoqVKBUi66uB5pYXamWguKFaWdDnx): You also can use --- to roll your article up, where you want to roll it up.
> like:
> First line
> ---
> This will be rolled up.

How can I fix a topic?

> [nofishes](#comment_3_12yaKkoqVKBUi66uB5pYXamWguKFaWdDnx): Move your mouse to the topic's left, you will see a pencil, click it ;)

clicking on the pencil appears only to edit, can not find where it can fix.

> [nofishes](#comment_4_12yaKkoqVKBUi66uB5pYXamWguKFaWdDnx): Man, TVshows.bit for your site.

Thx man!! =)

So far only has the Season 01!
